Today we are remembering a devoted partner, reporter, and colleague. Jamal's story will not be forgotten.

Protecting human rights around the world should be a top priority to the US. Who are we if we don't stand for freedom and democracy? Those who are responsible for his death, even American allies, must be held accountable.

Six months ago, I signed a letter with over 40 of my colleagues asking the President to supply the legally-required report on the determination of responsibility in the death of Jamal Khashoggi. Still, we have heard nothing.

It's been one year since the murder of Jamal Khashoggi and I, along with the rest of the world, am still waiting for answers. https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2019/opinions/global-opinions/jamal-khashoggi-one-year-later/ …
